notary.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone, especially a lawyer, who has the legal power to make a signed statement or document official
notary.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone such as a lawyer with the legal power to notarize a document
notary.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the procedure that verifies certificates issued by notaries
Most of the centers offer secretarial and notary services.
